review: Now I can see Netflix in my LG 42 inches (wich is not a smart tv).
author: Carlos Niz

review: Works great and I think is easy to set up (my husband did it but hevhad no complaints). Great product for the price.
author: Suzio

review: 10 times better than roku or neotv.  Works perfect and fast
author: Devon Culleton

review: Excellent device.  Works as advertised.  Hoping future updates will allow for more apps to be casted to TV.
author: Z.O.

review: It is a good device, but it has limitation as there are not many applications that can be casted.  I can only use Netflix, and Youtube.  it does not cast from local drives nor internet explorer.
author: Einar Morales

review: configuration  easy,  but somewhat slow and Limited over your operation.....
author: Juan Pablo Vargas Acosta

review: Loses quality from source and keeps automatically disconnecting after some time use, generally every 30-60 min
author: Chris Spakoski

review: Great for what is currently provided..but would like to see more integrated apps
